title: My Google pixel XL is not coming leaving safe mode even after I restarted it
content: I have restarted twice now but still restarting to safe mode and the third time I tried to restart it my phone just went blank and was flashing a light down only and after 20minutes it came up again I also noticed my volume key just keep on pressing itself without not touching it if I should high the volume it's go down its self and the power button not responding but will just come up after some minutes again.
